Activity: Log in to the OA system, check emails and calendar invites. Prepare for the daily stand-up meeting.
Daily stand-up meeting with the team. Review progress, address any roadblocks, and coordinate tasks for the day.
Follow up with @Uiux-1 about any initial UI elements needed for the prototype, such as a health bar or ammo counter. @Uiux-1 UI Elements for prototype?
Dedicate time to address any immediate concerns or questions from team members. Provide guidance and support to ensure everyone is on track.
Review the integrated character controller, environment, and basic shooting mechanics. Playtest the prototype and identify any issues with the gameplay, visuals, or performance.
Collaborate with @Qtest-1 to perform a thorough test of the prototype. Document all found bugs, and make sure the process are documented clearly. @Qtest-1 Test play of prototype required
After bug reports are delivered, sort and prioritize them based on severity and impact on gameplay. Assign these tasks to relevant developers.
Review bug fixes implemented by the developers. Ensure the fixes are effective and do not introduce any new issues.
Update the project management software with progress on bug fixes and any new issues identified. Communicate any important updates or changes to the team.
